messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: Investigator Lewis and Chauffer Rodney Robinson were involved in the transfer of a decedent to a body bag. Technician Muhammad worked on collecting evidence at the scene. Sergeant McMullen and Detective Morton were at a home invasion scene with two eyewitnesses. Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers conducted tests on the eyewitnesses. Detective David Trehan worked on classifying the incident as a homicide. Detective Aucoin found and secured a set of keys at the crime scene. Detective Ryan Aucoin directed the processing of the crime scene. Detective Sergeant Chris Robert, Officer Juan Lopez, Officers Phil Burras & Quincy Broaden, Officers Nate Addison & Glen Hewitt, Detective Gregory Johnson, Detective Jason McGee, Detective Ananie Mitchell, and Detective Melvin McCullum were all mentioned in relation to various units and their activities. Detective Pratt handled a scene on Mazant Street. Detective Orlando Mathews was involved with photographic line-ups. Scientific Criminal Investigations Division Officer Gary Sallienger worked on a scene sketch. Detective Barret Morton interviewed a witness regarding the identification of a perpetrator. Orleans Parish Coroner's Office Investigator Parnell Williams was at a scene.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Involved in transferring a decedent to a body bag.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Chauffer Rodney RobinsonOfficer Context: Assisted Investigator Lewis with handling of a decedent.Officer Role: ChaufferOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Collected evidence at a crime scene.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Present at a home invasion scene with two eyewitnesses.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Worked at a home invasion crime scene and later conducted interviews regarding the case.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Conducted tests on eyewitnesses at the Homicide Office.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: Worked on classifying an incident as a homicide.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective AucoinOfficer Context: Found and secured a set of keys at the crime scene.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ryan AucoinOfficer Context: Directed the processing of a crime scene.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Mentioned in relation to a unit's activities.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of a unit's personnel.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Context: Mentioned as part of a unit's personnel.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate
